lead_paragraph: After losing more than $30 million, the International Fight League has canceled a card scheduled for August and is seeking help to stay afloat. The show was to have been held Aug. 15 at the Izod Center in East Rutherford, N.J. The I.F.L. said it might seek protection from creditors via the courts if it did not come up with a solution, like a new partner or investor.
